ComicInfo.Summary:
The Coven launch a missile attack drawing the unwanted attention of ARIA. Meanwhile, Kim Wu, Jago and Tusk must journey to the Astral Plane in hopes of discovering why the Guardians have abandoned them. The answer to this mystery, however, reveals a new horror they are unprepared to face.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Yildiray Cinar & Jorge Sutil | 1 | B | Cover B | Alvaro Sarraseca & Jordi Escuin Llorach | 2 | C | Subscription Cover C | Cam Adams & Jorge Sutil | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Alvaro Sarraseca | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Yildiray Cinar | 5 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 21:09:38. [CVDB660032]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Alvaro Sarraseca, Cam Adams, Jordi Escuin Ilorach, Jorge Sutil, Yildiray Cinar
ComicInfo.Characters: Aganos, ARIA, Jago, Kan-Ra, Kim Wu, Mira Fallegeros, Tusk
